item.title: WordPress Recommendations with Neo4j – Part 1: Data Modelling
item.description: This post is part of a series on building a recommendation engine with WordPress. If you haven’t already done so, check out the posts below: Part 1: Hooks & Data Modelling Part 2: Content Based Recommendations Part 3: Collaborative Filtering WordPress Recommendations with Neo4j – Part 4: PageRank with APOC Procedures Neo4j Recommendations for WordPress WordPress is arguably the world’s most popular CMS with reportedly almost a quarter of the internet running on a WordPress install.
